p: Four hours after administration of the latex, all doses showed significant ( p < 0.05) hypoglycemic effect compared to vehicle control ( Table 2). After 6 h, hypoglycemic effect of 400 and 600 mg/kg dose was significant ( p < 0.01) in normal mice but 200 mg/kg of the latex did not show hypoglycemic effect at 6 th h after treatment. In addition, glibenclamide (5 mg/kg) produced significant effect (hypoglycemia) at 2 ( p < 0.01), 4 ( p < 0.01), and 6 h ( p < 0.001) compared to the vehicle control.
